post.title: Eulerian Video Magnification
post.excerpt: Eulerian Video Magnification is a technique that is used to amplify small changes in a video sequence. This technique can be used to amplify small changes in a video sequence, such as the subtle changes in a person's face when they are speaking or when the person's heart is beating.
